Welcome to our page! We are The Authority, a casual/hobby band from Jakarta, Indonesia. We are salarymen just trying to get by while also love to play some music! 

We mostly do cover songs of our fave music and occasionally do some gig. Do check our cover in Youtube and say hi to our personnels on their social media!
